channel.title: Dadmother - Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full [post-rock/shoegaze]
channel.description: This is a very special piece that I wrote for my wonderful wife. I wanted to try and capture the emotions that run through me when I think of her, from little tender moments to overwhelming bouts of passion. Thank you for listening, and I hope you enjoy. This is [Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full](https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/loudly-we-sang-for-our-hearts-were-full/s-Rkb1P) ![image|500x500](upload://eo8P8ueEu2v94sNPgNZVQPHUbsA.jpeg)

item.title: Dadmother - Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full [post-rock/shoegaze]
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
Hey I get it, when we do passion projects and get little validation it’s frustrating to say the least. I try and give credit where it’s do when I can but for me as an antisocial it’s hard to speak through the anxieties. You’re uniquely technical and it’s nice to hear what you want to make not what you think others want to hear.

Read full topic
item.source: Dadmother - Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full [post-rock/shoegaze]

item.title: Dadmother - Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full [post-rock/shoegaze]
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Thank you, man. That means a lot! The dynamics and structure of this piece were vital in trying to convey the feelings and emotions of it, and I truly appreciate your kind words and input towards them

item.title: Dadmother - Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full [post-rock/shoegaze]
item.dc:creator: Devoid-of-joy
item.description:
On point, gorgeous setting and perfect pacing. I do very much like the calm build up and powerful finish. A work of passion and it shows. Exquisite track

This is a very special piece that I wrote for my wonderful wife. I wanted to try and capture the emotions that run through me when I think of her, from little tender moments to overwhelming bouts of passion. Thank you for listening, and I hope you enjoy.
This is Loudly We Sang, For Our Hearts Were Full
